resources.string: Start taking picture with Front face (green center block). Then rotate vertically to take pictures for Upper surface and Down surface. After that, rotate horizontally to take pictures of Left, Right and Back surface. (Note that you need to rotate right twice for the back surface)
We are a group of students from University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign. We coded this program as the final project of our CS125 class.
See our project Github for further details
If you find bugs during usage, or the color recognition process is inaccurate, we kindly ask that you help us improve by filling out this Google form
